    • Constructor Summary

      Application()
      Default constructor of class Aplication that loads data from the data base to member variables courseList and studentList.

                                     int courseNum)
        Add a new course to the database.
        Parameters:
        courseName - is the name of the new course.
        courseNum - is the number of the new course.
        Returns:
        string that indicates the result of adding this new course.

      • createLecture

        public java.lang.String createLecture(java.lang.String courseName,
                                      int courseNum,
                                      int secNum,
                                      int secCap)
        Add a lecture to a course.
        Parameters:
        courseName - is the name of the lecture will be added to.
        courseNum - is the number of the lecture will be added to.
        secNum - is the section number of this lecture.
        secCap - is the section capacity of this lecture.
        Returns:
        string that indicates the result of adding the lecture.

      • searchCourses

        public Course searchCourses(java.lang.String courseName,
                            int courseNum)
        Search for a course in the course List.
        Parameters:
        courseName - is the name of the course that needs to be searched.
        courseNum - is the number of the courses that needs to be searched.
        Returns:
        object of type course if the searched course is found. Otherwise returns null.

      • searchStudents

        public Student searchStudents(int id)
        Search for a student.
        Parameters:
        id - is the id of student that needs to be searched.
        Returns:
        object of type student if the searched student is found. Otherwise returns null.

      • loadStudent

        public Student loadStudent(java.lang.String name,
                           int id)
        Load the data of the student with given name and id.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of student.
        id - is the id of student.
        Returns:
        If the student with given name and id was not found, create a new profile for that student.

                                              Lecture lecture)
        Register a student to a lecture.
        Parameters:
        student - is the student that needs to be added to the lecture.
        lecture - is the lecture that will accept the student.
        Returns:
